design_system.name: Khesht (The Brick) - Solid Financial Foundations

identity.core_philosophy: Finance is not just numbers; it's life's architecture. The UI should feel like a well-crafted ledgerâ€”tactile, clear, and enduring.
anti_patterns: No pure white (#FFFFFF) backgrounds everywhere; use 'Paper' tones.
No flat, soulless gradients. Use texture or solid blocks.
No 'Inter' font. Use Vazirmatn for Farsi and Manrope for English.

rules: Use 'Vazirmatn' for all UI text (Labels, Headings, Buttons).
Use 'Manrope' ONLY for English numbers (prices, dates) and code snippets.
RTL Direction: Ensure 'dir=rtl' is set on the root html tag.
Letter Spacing: Farsi requires 0 or slightly negative tracking. Do not use wide tracking.

secondary.description: Warm Stone - The color of unbleached paper.

accent.description: Burnt Terracotta - For actions and alerts.

colors.gradients: None. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.

rtl_rules: Sidebar: Fixed on the RIGHT side.
Main Content: Margin Right (mr-64) instead of Margin Left.
Flex Direction: 'flex-row' automatically reverses in RTL, but verify alignment.
Icons: Flip directional icons (arrows, chevrons) using 'rtl:rotate-180'.

cards.style: Flat, White Surface, 1px Border (Stone-200), Soft Shadow (Shadow-sm).

buttons.primary: bg-teal-700 text-white hover:bg-teal-800 rounded-lg px-6 py-2 font-medium shadow-sm
buttons.secondary: bg-stone-100 text-stone-900 hover:bg-stone-200 rounded-lg px-6 py-2 font-medium
buttons.ghost: text-stone-600 hover:text-teal-700 hover:bg-teal-50 rounded-lg px-4 py-2

inputs.style: bg-white border-stone-200 focus:border-teal-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-teal-500/20 rounded-lg text-right dir-rtl

charts.style: Minimalist. Hide grid lines. Use palette colors (Teal, Terracotta, Stone). Rounded bars.

visual_enhancers.texture: Add a subtle 'noise' opacity-5 overlay to the main background to simulate paper.
visual_enhancers.decorations: Use abstract geometric shapes (Persian tile inspired) in faint SVG patterns on the sidebar background.

images.description: Soft abstract shapes for login/welcome screens (if needed).

universal_guidelines: Ensure high contrast for text (APCA standards).
Do not use gradients for text.
Use 'gap' for spacing, avoid margins on children.
RTL First: Test everything in RTL mode.
